name: Jabfab Inc.
tag_list: real-time-feedback, structured, social-engagement, listening, loyalty, un-survey, un-review, customer-experience-feedback, employee, audience, crowdsourced-sentiment
overview:
Jabfab is transforming the way businesses and consumers share feedback, on anything, in real-time. It’s a mobile and web platform for engaging and acting instantly upon uniquely structured social feedback from customers, employees or any type of audience or crowd.

Be honest, when you check out of a retail store, how often do you call the phone number on the bottom of the receipt to answer a survey, despite the offer of a prize? When did you last write a review on a travel, restaurant or business opinion site? Think about it, how frequently do you respond when hotels, airlines or other businesses sends you satisfaction surveys? Do you ever respond to phone surveys during the family dinner? Fill out comment cards at restaurants? No, neither do we.

Nevertheless, companies spend around $30B year on market research and $50B on operational analytics - much of it around information that’s limited, or too old to act upon when you need it most.

Introducing Jabfab - Real-time sentiment feedback for people to share how they feel about anything, anywhere, anytime. Re-inventing feedback, for the mobile social era - simple, instant and in the moment.

Jabfab is closed-loop. Consumers take privacy seriously, and are increasingly making it clear that they do not want big social networks to spy on their every comment (aka Social Listening).

When a consumer speaks to your business through Jabfab, they can do so in a closed-loop direct manner - outside their private social network. Furthermore, there’s no need to guess what the person is saying, via complex and expensive ’ social listening’ tools. Jabfab gives you unique STRUCTURED sentiments - so you know explicitly how their feel - positive, negative or other.

Jabfab integrates with any physical object within your business. Every topic you create on Jabfab comes with a set of FREE Quick Response (QR) codes, that people can scan from our mobile app, or any 3rd party QR code scanner on a mobile device. The possibilities for instant feedback via physical objects are endless.

Embrace the truth of how people feel, and adapt in real-time to protect sales, increase loyalty and stand out from the rest - with Jabfab.
